name: Broccoli Souffle
author: Heather
summary: Passed down through the generations, this broccoli souffle recipe has become a holiday staple in our family. A savory taste with a crispy cheese topping makes it a sure win.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) bag frozen chopped broccoli, thawed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer
Add broccoli, cover, and steam until tender, 2 to 4 minutes
Melt margarine in a saucepan over medium heat
Add flour and stir until mixed
Slowly add the milk, stirring to prevent lumps
Cook until white sauce is thickened, about 10 minutes
Combine broccoli, eggs, mayonnaise, and onion in a baking dish; cover with white sauce and stir to combine
Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes
Sprinkle Cheddar cheese on top and bake until set, about 15 minutes more
